t: For the choir director. A psalm of the sons of Korah.
Clap*pn your hands, all you peoples; shout*ln to God with a jubilant cry.
For*ln the Lord,*s the Most High, is awe-inspiring, a*ln great King over the whole earth.
He*ln subdues peoples under us and*ln nations under our feet.
He*ln chooses for us our inheritance — the*ln pride of Jacob, whom he loves. Selah*ig
God*pn ascends among shouts of joy, the*ln Lord,*s with the sound of a ram’s horn.
Sing*ln praise to God, sing praise; sing*ln praise to our King, sing praise!
Sing*ln a song of wisdom, for*ln God is King of the whole earth.
God*pn reigns over the nations; God*ln is seated on his holy throne.
The*ln nobles of the peoples have assembled with*ln the people of the God of Abraham. For*ln the leaders of the earth belong to God; he*ln is greatly exalted.
